name: Decentify
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

The following token has a variable tax function on the smart contract to change tax rates post deployment.
Do your own research and be careful if you are trading this token.

description.en:
What is the project about?
Decentralized web3 music platform that aims to revolutionize the music industry. By leveraging blockchain technology and smart contracts, Decentify creates a fair and transparent ecosystem for musicians, artists, and music enthusiasts.

What makes your project unique?
Utilizes decentralized storage and content distribution mechanisms, ensuring secure and global access to music files. It also employs blockchain-based smart contracts to automate royalty payments, eliminating disputes and delays in revenue distribution

History of your project.
Came for the idea to leverage spotify into the web3 spaces, makes the Intelectual Property management and subscription more easy and transparent

What’s next for your project?
To create an IP management platform for music creator, subscription systems to private content

What can your token be used for?
Subscription, Royalties, Token Gating
